name: Natural_Evolution_Expansion
title: 自然演化-扩张
author: TheSAguy
description: 虫族演化及扩张。现在扩张包括几个阶段，从和平地到Armageddron。每个阶段扩张都会更大规模及更强硬。该Mod是自然演化mod的其中之一，不过也能单独使用。访问主页以了解更多信息
description_original: Manages Evolution & Expansion. Expansion now comes in Phases: Peacefull to Armageddron. At each Phase the Expansion becomes largeer and tougher. Part of the N.E. Mods, but can be used as Standalone. Please visit home page for more details.
